indicators.label: Due For Viral Load
indicators.name: due_for_vl
indicators.description: Patients who are due for a Viral Load test.

indicators.label: Elevatated VL
indicators.name: elevated_vl
indicators.description: Patients with Viral Load greater than 1000.

indicators.label: Case manager
indicators.name: case_manager
indicators.description: A person who assists in the planning, coordination, monitoring, and evaluation of medical services for a patient with emphasis on quality of care, continuity of services, and cost-effectiveness.

indicators.label: Has case manager
indicators.name: has_case_manager
indicators.description: Patients who have been assigned a case manager to provide clinical support.

indicators.label: Has Phone RTC
indicators.name: has_phone_rtc
indicators.description: Patients who have been given a phone follow up date

indicators.label: Phone Follow up date
indicators.name: phone_follow_up_date
indicators.description: The date a patient is scheduled to be followed up via phone

indicators.label: Days since follow up
indicators.name: days_since_follow_up
indicators.description: The number of days since the patient's last encounter.

indicators.label: Days since missed appointment
indicators.name: days_since_missed_appointment
indicators.description: The Number of days a Client has missed coming to Clinic since their last Return to Clinic Date.

indicators.label: Newly Enrolled
indicators.name: newly_enrolled
indicators.description: Patients who have been enrolled 30 days or less from current date.
